desc: Luxury silk pillowcases and silk accessories. Your skin and hair will stay healthier for longer with our high grade silk's anti-ageing properties. The luxurious softness of our silk glides on your skin and hair, reducing face creases, fine lines and skin damage, and achieving noticeably smoother and silkier hair.

layout.text:
Our 100% high grade Mulberry Silk pillowcases look after your skin and hair while you sleep, and our bespoke designs, patterns, prints and trim are proudly exclusive
to our label worldwide.
Have sweet dreams on us xx
